message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You were too generous, let's be a bit more realistic!
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! I'll meet you halfway.
You're not meeting me halfway, I'm taking control now!
You're getting a bit too bold, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but not that much.
You're not serious, let's see how you like it when I take the majority!
You're getting a bit too cocky, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but not that much more.
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't make me take it all!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but not much more.
It's now or never, Alice. You're not leaving with anything if you don't take this!
